article.title: Rescued from FARC
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.abstract: AFCEA and SIGNAL Magazine join all Americans in welcoming back our three countrymen who were rescued from the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Columbia (FARC) terrorists in Colombia last week. Northrop Grumman, their employer, has updates on their return, including a statement from the former hostages and links to Department of Defense images.
article.text:
AFCEA and SIGNAL Magazine join all Americans in welcoming back our three countrymen who were rescued from the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Columbia (FARC) terrorists in Colombia last week.
Northrop Grumman, their employer, has updates on their return, including a statement from the former hostages and links to Department of Defense images, here.
